hero_description: Trade XCS tokens with institutional-grade security. Fast settlements, low fees, powered by blockchain technology.
vision_description: XCANNES connects blockchain innovation to the real economy, creating a bridge between tradition and disruption.
vision_mission_text: Create an accessible, transparent, and user-centered crypto ecosystem
vision_local_text: Rooted in Cannes, open to the world through XRP Ledger technology

vision_transparency_text: Clear governance, fair tokenomics, strong community
vision_cta_text: Discover our complete strategy and roadmap
buy_badge: Start your Web3 journey in 3 simple steps!
buy_step1_text: Download an XRPL-compatible wallet like Xaman (formerly Xumm), then create and secure your wallet to receive your tokens.
buy_step2_text: Add a trustline to authorize your wallet to securely receive the XCS token.
buy_step3_text: Buy your XCS tokens directly via our DEX or from centralized partners like Bitrue.
tokenomics_description: Transparent allocation model designed for sustainable growth, long-term value creation, and ecosystem prosperity
tokenomics_cta_text: Discover our complete tokenomics model, vesting schedules, and long-term sustainability strategy in our comprehensive whitepaper.
trustline_description: Enable XCS token reception on your XRPL wallet
trustline_info: Important: Adding a trustline is required before receiving XCS tokens. This is a one-time setup that costs ~0.00001 XRP.
faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about XCS tokens
faq_a1: XCS is a digital asset built on the XRP Ledger (XRPL), designed to provide fast, secure, and transparent transactions with minimal fees.
faq_q2: How do I buy XCS tokens?
faq_a2: Connect your XUMM wallet, add the XCS trustline, and trade directly on our DEX platform. The entire process takes less than 2 minutes.
faq_a3: XRPL network fees are minimal, typically around 0.00001 XRP per transaction. No hidden fees, complete transparency.
faq_a4: Yes. XCS is built on the XRP Ledger, one of the most secure and battle-tested blockchain networks with 10+ years of operation and zero downtime.
faq_a5: Absolutely. Our decentralized exchange operates 24/7/365 with instant settlements and global accessibility.

success_subtitle: Your payment has been successfully validated
success_payment_text: We have received your payment. Your XCS tokens will be transferred to your XRPL wallet in the next few minutes.
success_wallet_required_text: To receive your XCS tokens, please connect your XRPL wallet.
success_wallet_connected_text: Your XRPL wallet is successfully connected:
success_trustline_text: To receive your XCS tokens, make sure a trustline is configured on your XRPL wallet.
success_trustline_check1: If the trustline is already in place, you don't need to do anything
success_trustline_check2: Otherwise, configure it by clicking the button below
success_step1: Verify that your XCS trustline is properly configured
success_step2: Tokens will be transferred automatically in the next few minutes
success_step3: You will receive a notification in your XUMM wallet
success_step4: Check your balance to confirm receipt
